faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about CV Gen

q1.question: Is CV Gen really free to use?
q1.answer: Yes! You can create and download your resume completely free. We offer premium templates and features for users who want extra customization options.

q2.question: What is ATS and why does it matter?
q2.answer: ATS (Applicant Tracking System) is software that companies use to filter resumes. Many resumes are rejected before a human sees them. Our templates are designed to pass ATS scans while still looking beautiful.

q3.question: Can I upload my existing resume?
q3.answer: Absolutely! Our AI-powered parser can extract information from your existing PDF resume and auto-fill the fields, saving you time and effort.

q4.question: What file formats can I download?
q4.answer: You can download your resume as a high-quality PDF, which is the most widely accepted format by employers. We also provide a shareable link you can send directly to recruiters.

q5.question: How many resumes can I create?
q5.answer: Create as many resumes as you need! We recommend tailoring your resume for each job application to maximize your chances of getting an interview.
